details.bonfire: Cozy outdoor bonfire spot perfect for evening gatherings and storytelling under the stars.
details.grill: Outdoor grilling area with all the equipment you need for a perfect barbecue.
details.conference: Perfect for meetings, presentations and gatherings up to 20 people.
details.kitchen: Fully equipped kitchen for multiple people.
details.tenisTable: Indoor tennis table setup, your go-to solution for active entertainment during rain or snow or it might just keep children busy.

twinStandard.name: Twin Standard
twinStandard.description: Comfortable room with twin single beds, perfect for friends or colleagues traveling together.

tripleStandard.name: Triple Standard
tripleStandard.description: Spacious room with three comfortable single beds, ideal for small groups.

matrimoniala.name: Double Room
matrimoniala.description: Romantic double room with amenities for couples.

family.name: Family Room
family.description: Perfect for families of 4! Spacious room with one king size bed and two single beds.
